description: Retrieves detailed information about a specified server.

nested_items.name: associatedApplications
nested_items.description: The associated application group the server belongs to, as defined in AWS Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: ID of the application as defined in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the application as defined in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token you use to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.

nested_items.name: serverDetail
nested_items.description: Detailed information about the server.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportS3Object
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name and Amazon S3 key name for anti-pattern report.

nested_items.name: s3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: s3key
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 key name.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the anti-pattern report generation.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the anti-pattern report generation.

nested_items.name: applicationComponentStrategySummary
nested_items.description: A list of strategy summaries.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The count of recommendations per strategy.

nested_items.name: strategy
nested_items.description: The name of recommended strategy.

nested_items.name: dataCollectionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of assessment for the server.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The server ID.

nested_items.name: lastAnalyzedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the server was assessed.

nested_items.name: listAntipatternSeveritySummary
nested_items.description: A list of anti-pattern severity summaries.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Contains the count of anti-patterns.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: Contains the severity of anti-patterns.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the server.

nested_items.name: recommendationSet
nested_items.description: A set of recommendations.

nested_items.name: strategy
nested_items.description: The recommended strategy.

nested_items.name: targetDestination
nested_items.description: The recommended target destination.

nested_items.name: transformationTool
nested_items.description: The target destination for the recommendation set.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Description of the tool.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the tool.

nested_items.name: tranformationToolInstallationLink
nested_items.description: URL for installing the tool.

nested_items.name: serverError
nested_items.description: The error in server analysis.

nested_items.name: serverErrorCategory
nested_items.description: The error category of server analysis.

nested_items.name: serverType
nested_items.description: The type of server.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of data collection, which contains detailed descriptions of any error messages.

nested_items.name: systemInfo
nested_items.description: System information about the server.

nested_items.name: cpuArchitecture
nested_items.description: CPU architecture type for the server.

nested_items.name: fileSystemType
nested_items.description: File system type for the server.

nested_items.name: networkInfoList
nested_items.description: Networking information related to a server.

nested_items.name: interfaceName
nested_items.description: Information about the name of the interface of the server for which the assessment was run.

nested_items.name: ipAddress
nested_items.description: Information about the IP address of the server for which the assessment was run.

nested_items.name: macAddress
nested_items.description: Information about the MAC address of the server for which the assessment was run.

nested_items.name: netMask
nested_items.description: Information about the subnet mask of the server for which the assessment was run.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Information about the type of operating system.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Information about the version of operating system.
